title: Is We Dumb? | Strobe Light. Tampon. Lottery Ticket. Rickey Henderson.
description:
If you were stuck in a bar in the middle of nowhere for a few days, who would you want stuck there with you? An Oasis cover band? Probably not. Let's talk about that, an airplane dumping poop all over this dude's yard, sticking your hand in a toaster, a crazy hostel owner that gives off serial killer vibes, and more on today's episode of Is We Dumb?!

 

New episodes every Wednesday at 12pm PST

 

Watch this episode on YouTube:  https://youtu.be/D5NgvaLPKPM

 

Suggestions for segment content: dumb@iswedumb.com

Anything else: info@iswedumb.com
